purpose: To provide AI agents with seamless access to cryptocurrency wallets and facilitate on-chain transactions, enhancing their capabilities in the blockchain ecosystem.
principle: AgentKit operates under the principle of decentralization, allowing AI agents to interact directly with blockchain networks without intermediaries, thus ensuring transparency and security.
reusability: AgentKit is designed for reusability, allowing developers to integrate its functionalities into various AI applications and frameworks with minimal effort.
limitations: Currently, AgentKit is in alpha status, which may imply potential instability and incomplete features. Additionally, it may have limited support for certain blockchain protocols or wallet types.
name: agentkit
description: AgentKit is a toolkit that gives AI agents access to crypto wallets and onchain functionality. Powered by the 0xGasless AgentKit SDK.
